alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:44PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gilpin, southeastern Clear Creek and northwestern Jefferson Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookvale, or 25 miles west of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evergreen, Idaho Springs, Kittredge, Indian Hills, White Ranch Open Space, Aspen Park, Brookvale, Bergen Park and Floyd Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
